thread.title: BRIEF-Yum Brands Says CEO Of Yum Greg Creed's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $12.4 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yum Brands Says CEO Of Yum Greg Creed's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $12.4 Mln
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Yum! Brands Inc:
* YUM BRANDS SAYS CEO OF YUM GREG CREED’S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $12.4 MLN VS $15.4 MLN IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING
* YUM BRANDS SAYS PRESIDENT AND CFO OF YUM DAVID GIBBS’ FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $7.5 MILLION VERSUS $6.6 MILLION IN FY 2016
* CEO OF KFC DIVISION ROGER EATON’S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $5.1 MILLION VERSUS $5.2 MILLION IN FY 2016
* YUM BRANDS SAYS FORMER CEO OF TACO BELL DIVISION BRIAN NICCOL'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $4.7 MILLION VERSUS $6.2 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text: [ bit.ly/2EqWmYa ] Further company coverage:
